desc: We sell true ceremonial cacao roasted over wood fire by Mayan artisans in Guatemala through an ethical model that sends an average of 10x the "Fair Trade" rate back to the source country. We ship worldwide from our cacao cafe in Portland, Oregon, USA.

layout.text: EXPERIENCE DRINKING CHOCOLATE MADE WITH WOOD FIRE-ROASTED CACAO!
SOUL LIFT CACAO IS ONE OF THE ONLY U.S. COMPANIES PROVIDING TRUE CEREMONIAL CACAO, ROASTED OVER A WOOD FIRE BY MAYAN INDIGENOUS PEOPLE.
LEVEL UP YOUR LIFE WITH THIS ANCIENT SUPERFOOD THAT’S LIKE MEDICINE FOR YOUR SOUL.
WE SHIP WORLDWIDE, OR YOU CAN VISIT OUR CACAO CAFE IN PORTLAND, ORE.!
